plot: Three pigs' career as a jazz band is complicated by a wolf they rejected for membership who keeps blowing down their gigs.
title: Three Little Bops
plot_es: Three pigs' career as a jazz band is complicated by a wolf they rejected for membership who keeps blowing down their gigs.
plot_en: Three pigs' career as a jazz band is complicated by a wolf they rejected for membership who keeps blowing down their gigs.

cast.role: Narrator /              Big Bad Wolf /              Three Little Pigs
